Sentencas: The theoretical performance of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with oxygen ion conducting and proton conducting electrolytes are presented in this paper.
Titulo: Theoretical performance analysis of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells with different electrolytes

Sentencas: It was reported in a previous work that an SOFC with a proton conducting electrolyte (SOFC-H+) offers higher efficiency than an SOFC with an oxygen ion conducting electrolyte (SOFC-O2-).
Titulo: Theoretical performance analysis of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells with different electrolytes

Sentencas: However, the study was based on the same steam-to-hydrocarbon feed ratio.
Titulo: Theoretical performance analysis of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells with different electrolytes

Sentencas: Our previous work demonstrated the potential benefit of the SOFC-O2- over the SOFC-H+ in terms of a lower requirement for steam in the feed.
Titulo: Theoretical performance analysis of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells with different electrolytes

Sentencas: Therefore, in this article, this benefit is taken into account in the performance comparison.
Titulo: Theoretical performance analysis of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells with different electrolytes

Sentencas: Influences of mode of operation (i.e. plug flow (PF) and well-mixed (WM)) on the performance of SOFCs were also investigated.
Titulo: Theoretical performance analysis of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells with different electrolytes

Sentencas: In the PF mode, two feeding patterns (i.e. co-current (Co) and counter-current (CC)) were considered.
Titulo: Theoretical performance analysis of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells with different electrolytes

Sentencas: The results show that theoretical SOFC efficiencies depend on the type of electrolyte, mode of operation, inlet H2O:EtOH ratio and fuel utilization.
Titulo: Theoretical performance analysis of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells with different electrolytes

Sentencas: Although it was found that the feeding pattern has an influence on EMF distribution along the cell, the average EMF is not affected.
Titulo: Theoretical performance analysis of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells with different electrolytes

Sentencas: At the best conditions for each type of SOFC, it was observed that SOFC-O2- yields a maximum efficiency at the minimum inlet H2O:EtOH ratio which is the limit for carbon formation for each value of fuel utilization.
Titulo: Theoretical performance analysis of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells with different electrolytes

Sentencas: On the other hand, in SOFC-H+, optimum inlet H2O:EtOH ratios are higher than the limit of carbon formation.
Titulo: Theoretical performance analysis of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells with different electrolytes

Sentencas: At the optimum conditions, the rank of the various SOFCs is as follows: SOFC-H+(PF) >
Titulo: Theoretical performance analysis of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells with different electrolytes

Theoretical performance analysis of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells with different electrolytes

Sentencas: No difference in SOFC efficiency between both feeding patterns was observed.
Titulo: Theoretical performance analysis of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells with different electrolytes

Sentencas: It is clear from our theoretical studies that the SOFC-H+(PF) is the most promising SOFC system.
Titulo: Theoretical performance analysis of ethanol-fuelled solid oxide fuel cells with different electrolytes
